• Never point out any mistakes of the service providers in front of the clients.
• Try to understand the challenges faced by the service providers working in their area and address them in 
the best possible way.
• Can be given individually and in a group setting also.
• Always recognise and praise the work of the service providers done well to keep them motivated and happy.
